## Welcome

Welcome to the course materials for **AI and Data Science for Transport**.
This comprehensive course is designed to bridge the gap between traditional transport planning and cutting-edge AI technologies.

Our goal is to help you:

-   **Automate** repetitive tasks.
-   **Analyze** complex datasets efficiently.
-   **Visualize** transport patterns with clarity.

### See What's Possible

In this course, you will learn how to generate professional outputs like this origin-destination map of the South East, using AI-assisted workflows:

![Commuting flows in the South East of England](images/tfse_od_map.png)

### Get Started

-   Check the [Prerequisites](prerequisites.qmd) to set up your environment.
-   View the [Schedule](schedule.qmd) to see what we will cover.
-   See the [Get Data](get-data.qmd) page for data access.
-   Jump to [Session 1](s1.qmd) to begin.
